green-apple-yogurt-salad.name: Green Apple and Yogurt Salad
green-apple-yogurt-salad.description: A vibrant and refreshing salad that delights your senses. The crisp tartness of green apple combines with cool cucumber and creamy yogurt for a harmonious, light combination. Perfect as an appetizer, side dish, or any-time meal. ü•óüçè

steps.1: Wash the apples and cucumber thoroughly. Peel the cucumber and slice it thinly. Cut the apples into cubes, leaving the peel on if preferred.
steps.2: In a large bowl, mix the natural yogurt with lemon juice and honey. Stir well until fully combined.
steps.3: Add the apples and cucumber to the yogurt mixture. Toss gently to coat.
steps.4: Mix in the chopped walnuts and raisins, distributing them evenly.
steps.5: Wash and dry the lettuce leaves. Arrange them on a serving platter.
steps.6: Spoon the apple-cucumber salad over the lettuce. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
steps.7: Refrigerate for at least 15 minutes before serving to let flavors meld.

chickpea-spinach-burgers.name: Chickpea and Spinach Burgers
chickpea-spinach-burgers.description: A delicious and healthy option, perfect for any occasion and easy to make. They're juicy, full of flavor, and easy to prepare, ideal for vegetarians and healthy food lovers. üçîüå±

steps.1: Rinse and drain the cooked chickpeas and place them in a large bowl.
steps.2: Add the chopped spinach, onion, and minced garlic to the bowl.
steps.3: Mash the chickpeas and mix with the other ingredients until well combined.
steps.4: Season with ground cumin, sweet paprika, salt, and pepper.
steps.5: Add the bread crumbs, olive oil, and salt to the mixture and mix well until all ingredients are combined..
steps.6: Form the mixture into 4 equal-sized patties.
steps.7: Heat a pan over medium heat and cook the patties for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until golden brown.
steps.8: Remove the burgers from the pan and place them on paper towels to remove excess oil.
steps.9: Serve with lettuce leaves, tomato slices, and hamburger buns.
